PPIS Family Service Centre (West) is appealing for lucky draw prizes for our Back to School event on 7 December 2024, held for low-income families to encourage family bonding and to celebrate the success of their children in completing the school academic year to move on  to the next year.
 
This year, our theme is “Family First: Cherishing Togetherness”. We hope that the families can use this platform to harness and celebrate the strengths in their children/wards as they forge a closer bond with each other. Therefore, the prizes that we are looking for need to be suitable for families with children from preschool, primary, secondary to tertiary levels.
If you are keen to donate, do let us know before 29 Nov 2024.
Our contact details are as follows:  
Office no: 6561 3462

Contact person: Liyana

Thank you!  
**Important note: We seek your understanding to not spread or share this message without prior consent. Your cooperation is greatly appreciated!

name: Computer/Desktop
description:
PPIS Family Service Centre (West) is appealing for lucky draw prizes for our Back to School event on 7 December 2024, held for low-income families to encourage family bonding and to celebrate the success of their children in completing the school academic year to move on  to the next year. 

This year, our theme is “Family First: Celebrating the Moments of Togetherness”. We hope that the families can use this platform to harness and celebrate the strengths in their children/wards as they forge a closer bond with each other. Therefore, the prizes that we are looking for need to be suitable for families with children from preschool, primary, secondary to tertiary levels. 

If you are keen to donate, do let us know before 29 Nov 2024.

Our contact details are as follows:  
Office no: 6561 3462  
Office mobile no:  81891185 / 91852971 
Contact person: Ms Regine / Ms Fadhilah 

Thank you!  

**Important note: We seek your understanding to not spread or share this message without prior consent. Your cooperation is greatly appreciated!
